item.title: tetrinet rules
item.description: i keep getting 0wned. its a bit different than tetris on the GB. hah. stupid GB.

item.title: tetrinet
item.description: i am currently trying to play tetrinet. heh. hopefully it will KILL a good month of my life. haha. i love tetris. love it. in fact. i had a dream of playing it on the game boy. LOVE
